pages.text:
ArrowHead Men’s and Ladies' Club Championship and ArrowHead Cup
The ArrowHead Men’s and Ladies Club Championship will be played again this year in conjunction with the ArrowHead Cup.  The Club Championship will be played on the weekend of April 9th and 10th.  The low 8 scores plus ties from round 1 will qualify for the Championship Flight of the Club Championship.  The Men’s Championship Flight will play from the Blue Tees for round 1 and the Green Tees for round 2.  The Ladies Championship Flight will play from the Red Tees for both rounds.  Players not qualifying for the Championship Flight will play in flights based on handicap to determine flight winners for the remaining flights.
The ArrowHead Cup is the Net (handicap) version of the Club Championship and played at the same time as the Club Championship.  The winners are determined by the low score (net) for two rounds.
Tee Times for round one will start at 8:30 AM with the men followed by the ladies.  Tee times for round two will start at 11:30 for the ladies followed by the men.  Players must have an established handicap to play in flights other than Championship flight and all participants must be a paid member of the Arrowhead Golf Club.  We are looking for a record turnout this year.
Pre-registration and pre-payment is required.  The deadline for sign up is April 8th at 5:00 PM.
Championship History
Men’s Club Champion
Men’s ArrowHeadCup Champion
Women’s Club Champion
Women’s ArrowHeadCup Champion

Summer Membership Benefits include:
The 2025 Summer Membership
(Limited memberships available)
May 1st – October 31, 2025 - Green fees included and can play seven (7) days a week. Member cart fee $28.00 plus tax 5/1/2025 - 10/31/2025.
Advance tee times reservations 6 days in advance ( general public is four (4) days)
Unlimited use of the practice facilities, includes 1/2 price buckets of range balls.
Reduced guest fees
Walking fee $28 plus tax 5/1/2025 - 10/31/2025 (available after 11am)
Reciprocal Privileges May-October
No monthly dues or minimum charges
Summer Membership Fees
Single $800
Family $1250
Bag Storage $50
Download Application

ArrowHead Golf club is pleased to offer three membership opportunities featuring a variety of outstanding privileges and benefits:  Our Annual Membership Platinum and Gold, offered for play seven days a week throughout the year, and Summer Memberships.
In addition to the value and convenience of access to ArrowHead's golf course and amenities on an annual basis, all our memberships offer the many intangible benefits that come with participation in special members-only programs and events throughout the year...camaraderie and a sense of belonging.
Member events include:
ArrowHead Cup
Club Championship - Men's and Ladies'
